name: Related Products for WooCommerce
author: SaffireTech

sections.description:
Related Products for WooCommerce is a WooCommerce plugin that allows store owners to select related products based on categories, tags, or individual picks, displayed seamlessly in an AJAX slider. Enhance user experience and boost sales with personalized product suggestions.

  • Choose custom related products on a product level – Choose to show by categories, tags, or hand picked selections.
  • Utilize a custom shortcode [rpwfr_custom_related_products_display] to showcase custom related products anywhere on the product page.
  • The custom shortcode renders an AJAX slider that allows your customers to enjoy a fast, fluid browsing experience, showcasing an unlimited number of products without compromising site speed. With initial loads set for immediate viewing and more products just a click away, customer engagement has never been smoother
  • Seamlessly set the number of products to be displayed per row across various devices such as desktops, mobile and tablet devices.
  • Compatible with all WooCommerce product types, including Simple, Variable, Grouped, and Downloadable.

With Related Products Pro for WooCommerce – the PRO version of this plugin, take your sales game to the next level with the following features:

  • Bulk Update Related Products: Instead of tediously updating each product, bulk manage Related Products up to 50 products simultaneously, offering a capacity that is far advanced and superior to the free version where you manually set Related products for each product. This feature is a game-changer for larger stores seeking efficiency.

  • Advanced Bulk Management: With Related Products Pro for WooCommerce, you can seamlessly bulk edit not just Related Products but also Upsells and Cross-Sells across your entire product range from a single screen in one action, turning a time-consuming task into a swift, satisfying process. This not only saves time but also giving you complete control over all types of products suggestions on your entire store and setting up your store for maximum sales and success.

  • Unlock More Options for Related Products AJAX Slider: – Our AJAX Slider feature transforms the way products are displayed in the Related Products and UpSells section. With the PRO version, you get advanced options to Show Product Ratings on Related Products, Show Sale price on Related Products and Hide Out-of-Stock items from showing up in the Related Products slider for all products.

Custom Related Products

Instead of letting WooCommerce decide your Related Products, set Custom Related Products of your choice – Opt to show by Category, Tag, or Handpick products yourself.

Maximize Product Visibility

Implement a Customizable AJAX Slider for Tailored Related Products with a Custom Shortcode. Set as many products as you want without breaking the product page.

Boost Your Sales

Setting Related Products, UpSells and Cross-Sells for WooCommerce products has never been easier. Use this plugin to set them up quickly, increase product visibility and increase your sales in the process.

Recommended Plugins:

  • Discontinued Product Stock Status for WooCommerce
  • Dynamic Cart Messages for WooCommerce

sections.installation:
1. Upload the sft-related-products-woocommerce plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Click on the \’Settings\’ link or in the WordPress dashboard click on Related Products menu
